author: mwbrooks
msg: Update README.md to reflect rework->master merge.

author: mwbrooks
msg: Ticket #2, #3: Add build-time script for joDoc.
This is an executable Ruby script that is available at:
./bin/phonegap-docs
The script has three build steps:
1. Markdown Processing:
- For each file
- Run arbitrary script / class
2. Run joDoc
3. HTML Processing:
- For each file
- Run arbitrary script / class
Change Summary:
- Markdown Processing: YAML Front Matter
- Each file can add meta-data using a YAML Front Matter
- We can now document supported platforms, type, return type, etc
- Markdown Processing: Quirks Merging
- Each platform can document its own quirk
- The quirk is then merged into the PhoneGap object documentation
- Markdown Processin: Table of Contents generator
- Generate a table of contents for each page, using H2 elements
- This will likely be put into HTML Processing
- Specs for most of the scripts
- Spec template data for testing

author: becka11y
msg: Ticket #64: Add iPhone Quirk for notification.beep
- beep.wav is required to play the beep notification
- The PhoneGap-iPhone project does not include beep.wav

author: becka11y
msg: Updated req. for iphone beep.wav file

author: becka11y
msg: tested on iPhone.  Fixed bugs in code.  Also removed call to non-existent function clearWatch() from within startWatch. Since this is a stand alone example, I did not see a reason for clearWatch (which presumably would null out the watchID). Added button in clearWach example to stop watching the accelerometer.
